definitions.body: lit. [[מִיׇּדֶיְ]] ´[[וְהִכְרַתִּי כ]] Mic 5:11, said of Isr.; ´[[רׂב כ]] Is 47:9, Is 47:12 ‖[[חֲבָרַיִח]], said of Babylon.
fig. of seductive and corrupting influences: of Jezebel 2Ki 9:22 ‖[[זְנוּנִים]]; of Nineveh personif. as harlot Na 3:4 (‖ id.), called ´[[בַּעֲלַת כ]] v:Na 3:4 (following [[זוֹנׇהמֵרׂב זְנוּנֵי]]).
